title: I need 60 RP. I drew my favorite skin :)
body:
_Inside a bush, a Cotton tail teemo is placing a shroom while the battle rages on in summoner's rift. Snow is starting to fall, the minions have families too... when will they ever rest? maybe Christmas? 
_

Hello, I need exactly 60 Riot Points (no more please) for a Chest. Will be happy to get some help :) 

Also, funniest thing happened today, I opened a chest and a chest came out. So I opened that chest only to find another chest... I didn't know this feature existed. Pretty cool!

replies.body:
Oh yes, a harmless looking cottontail Teemo hiding lovely eggs...of despair and destruction!!!  There's no rest for the wicked, and I'm sure Teemo is on  Santa Draven's naughty list!  

He liked your drawing though, so he may have spun some RP at your direction.  :D  Also, grats on that chest within a chest!

Wow, send my gratitude to Santa Draven! "SANTA DRAVEN! Thank you SO MUCH!!!!!!" 


also, it was a chest within a chest within a chest. Thought I was having a dejavu in the midst of all that happiness.
60 rp..? Thats a bit too much :x
